name: Chill Hop Quest
summary:
Join Hoody in his search for inspiration to become a Chillhop producer. Take your time to enjoy the music, relax and explore the colorful realms of imagination. Go through 60 stages and retrieve all musical notes with as little moves as possible to collect those sweet, sweet records. 
 
Chill Hop Quest is a puzzle game where new mechanics are introduced continuously as you advance. Different tiles interact in different ways with the player, and combining the ones you've seen with each new kind enables entirely new strategies. 
 
Be sure to open your mind to the possibilities!
